name: Bump!
description:
A puzzle-endless-runner about smashing your head into rocks for score. Made for 7DRL 2013.

Use Q,W,E,A,S,D or U,I,O,J,K,L to play. R to restart.

If you are downloading the game, click outside of it for a reminder of instructions. Click View on the menu to set it to fullscreen or just resize the window.
